description: In progress. Currently working with Typescript, Ansible, Docker, Jenkins, and Pendo.

Solace PubSub+ Cloud is a web-based managed software-as-a-service that is comprised of two independent services: the Event Mesh, and the Event Portal. I worked on the Event Portal service, which is a web-based platform used to design, create, and visualize the ecosystem of event-driven architectures. There I was able to develop Java applications in a microservice-based backend, create REST APIs and endpoints that interact with MySql databases, and implement UI/UX features using Aurelia, Javascript, HTML and SCSS.

As a DevOps Engineer, I designed and implemented a CICD pipeline system using Typescript and Amazon Web Services to build, test and deploy Mitel CloudLink SDKs. I had hands-on experience with the AWS SDK, the Octokit Github REST API, JFrog Artifactory, and AWS resources such as Lambda, Codebuild, S3, Cloudformation & Cloudwatch. For context, Cloudlink is a cloud-first unified communications API platform that serves as the communications backbone for dozens of Mitel applications. Built on AWS, it is implemented using serverless techniques & technologies, with containerized workloads for SIP and SMS communications.
